hypothesis_content.title: Stablecoin Supply Growth Divergence as Early Bull Signal
hypothesis_content.statement: When aggregate stablecoin supply (USDT+USDC) grows at >5% monthly rate while BTC price remains in neutral range (-10% to +10% over 30 days), this represents accumulation that precedes a regime shift to BULL within 20 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Stablecoin supply represents 'dry powder' waiting to deploy. Growth during price stagnation suggests accumulation. Combined with recent Fed liquidity injection, this creates potent setup for regime transition.
entry_conditions: BTC price between -10% and +10% over same 30 days
Crypto Fear & Greed Index <50 (neutral or fearful)

exit_conditions.take_profit: BTC enters BULL regime (price >+15% from entry)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Stablecoin supply growth turns negative before breakout
exit_conditions.time_exit: 20 trading days after entry if no regime shift

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Stablecoin supply grows but price breaks DOWN out of range, or supply growth fails to catalyze upward move within specified timeframe.
